column3: What's up with the random optimisation?
sorry, checked out from the wrong worktree

I thought I was doing something wrong :$
Thanks for fixing this.
Tested ACK c45cbaf

$ src/bitcoind -datadir=/store/tmp/testbtc -reindex-chainstate -stopatheight=200000 -printtoconsole
2017-06-11 12:00:02 UpdateTip: new best=000000000000034a7dedef4a161fa058a2d67a173a90155f3a2fe6fc132e0ebf height=200000 version=0x00000002 log2_work=68.741562 tx=7316696 date='2012-09-22 10:45:59' progre
Can you move this line out of the loop? No need to parse the command line argument for every block.
